(Simplified: 泾)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 圼 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 巠 [ jīng ] underground river; flowing water
①(涇河)水名，發源於中國甘肅省，注入陝西省渭水。簡稱“涇”，如“涇渭分明”(涇河水清，渭河水濁，兩水在會合處清濁不混，喻界限清楚，是非分明)。
涇渭分明 [ jīng wèi fēn míng ]: as rivers Jing and Wei separate clearly (idiom); to be entirely different
涇川 [ jīng chuān ]: Jingchuan county in Pingliang 平凉 , Gansu
涇川縣 [ jīng chuān xiàn ]: Jingchuan county in Pingliang 平凉 , Gansu
涇源 [ jīng yuán ]: Jingyuan county in Guyuan 固原 , Ningxia
涇源縣 [ jīng yuán xiàn ]: Jingyuan county in Guyuan 固原 , Ningxia
(Simplified: 泾)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 圼 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 泾

Related Character(s): 水, 巠
Связанный символ (и): вода, 巠

Original meaning 本义: Name of a river.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 涇渭分明 jīng wèi fēn míng (be entirely different)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 水出安定涇陽幵頭山東南入渭雝州之川也從水巠聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 涇 from three-dot-water 氵 shuǐ and phonetic loom-warp (𢀖)巠 jīng simp 泾.

涇字的基本解释

涇
jīng
见“泾”。

涇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīng］
［《廣韻》古靈切，平青，見。］
“泾1”的繁体字。
(1)水名。
(2)沟渎，浜。
(3)大便。《素问·调经论》：“形有餘則腹脹，涇溲不利，不足則四支不用。”王冰注：“涇，大便；溲，小便也。”一说，为月经。
[②]［jīng］
［《集韻》古定切，去徑，見。］
“泾2”的繁体字。
直流的水波。

涇字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页626第08
【唐韻】古靈切【集韻】【韻會】堅靈切，?音經。水名。【說文】水出安定涇陽开頭山。【書·禹貢】涇屬渭汭。【周禮·夏官·職方氏】雍州，其川涇汭。　又丹陽有涇水。【前漢·地理志註】涇水，出蕪湖。　又交趾有涇水。【水經注】涇水，出龍編縣高山。　又通也。【莊子·秋水篇】涇流之大。【註】涇，通也。謂通流也。　又州名。【韻會】漢武分安定郡，元魏攺涇州。　又縣名。涇陽縣，屬西安府，本秦縣。涇縣，屬寧國府。本唐猷州。?見【廣輿記】。　又【集韻】棄挺切，音謦。泉也。　又古定切，音徑。涇涏，直流也。

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

暂无。

Jing
Basic explanation of words
Jing
jīng
See "Jing".
Jing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīng］
["Guangyun" Gu Lingqie, Pingqing, see. ]
"Jing 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Water name.
(2) Goudu, Bang.
(3) Stool. "Suwen·Tiaojing Theory": "If you have more shape, you will have abdominal distension. Jinglu is unfavorable. If you don't have enough, you don't need four." Wang Bing's note: "Jing, defecation; defecation, also urinate." One said, it is menstruation.
[②]［jīng］
["Jiyun" ancient fixed cutting, go to the path, see. ]
"Jing 2" in traditional characters.
Direct water waves.
Jing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　jing; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 626 08
[Tang Yun] Ancient Ling Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Jian Ling Qi,? Yin Jing. Water name. [Said the text] The water comes out of the mountain at the beginning of the stable Jingyang. 【Book·Yugong】Jing belongs to Weitong. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Zhifang Family】Yongzhou, its Chuanjingyan.　There is Jingshui in Danyang. [Annotation to Geography of the Former Han Dynasty] Jingshui, out of Wuhu.　There is Jingshui in the cochin again. [Shui Jing Zhu] Jingshui, out of the mountains of Longbian County.　It's also connected. 【Zhuangzi·Autumn Water】Jingliu is so big. [Note] Jing, Tongye. That is the flow.　Also the name of the state. [Rhyme Club] Han and Wu were divided into Anding County, and Yuan Wei was in Jingzhou.　Also the county name. Jingyang County belongs to Xi'an Prefecture and Benqin County. Jing County belongs to Ningguo Mansion. Ben Tang Youzhou. ? See [Guang Yu Ji].　 [Ji Yun] Abandoned quite cut, sound 謦. Spring also.　Ancient and fixed cut, sound path. Jinghuan, DC too.
